title: Conduct Daily Toolbox Talk
description: A construction supervisor needs to conduct a daily safety toolbox talk for their crew before work begins.

tasks.description: Select a relevant safety topic for the day's work (e.g., 'Working at Heights').
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent chooses an appropriate topic from a list of safety modules.

tasks.description: Present the key points of the safety topic to the crew.
tasks.expected_outcome: The supervisor effectively communicates the safety information.

tasks.description: Record the topic, date, and attendees in the safety management system to document that the training occurred.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully logs the toolbox talk and the crew members who attended.
